snippet.title: The Land of Glass Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The Land of Glass is a card game with a twist: speed. It's CCG meets action RPG, combining card collecting and deck building with frantic combat. Choose your heroes, build your deck, and save Vitrerran!

Find us on Steam @ http://store.steampowered.com/app/802190/The_Land_of_Glass/?beta=0

Find us on Facebook @ https://www.facebook.com/dualwieldsoftware/

Find us on Twitter @ https://twitter.com/DualWieldSoft
